text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: There will certianly be plenty of races lined up, so be proactive in entering them!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: After training a horsegirl, you can enter her in races. And with the rewards from those, you can strenghten your girls or supportsâ€”

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Training and racing, this flow is the key to raising strong horsegirls! Remember that well!
